name: Buzzy Plugin: Overlays, modals and alerts
description:
Buzzy lets you build working apps straight from Figma.


This is an example app showing how to use overlays, modals, alerts, sidebars, and drop-downs with the Buzzy Figma plugin. Including tips on setup and background variations, the app itself scales responsively from mobile to desktop.


Grab this file, install the plugin and hit publish - you'll have a working app in a browser.


New to Buzzy? Try the 'Getting Started' guides
